page.title: 09M11 Motorway by Henham
page.content: At Elsenham M11 motorway bridge there are two lanes to Cambridge and two lanes to London. In 20 minutes in May 1985 we counted 319 vehicles going to London and 292 going to Cambridge this was from 11am.The M11 motorway was started in 1975.The M11 goes from London past Cambridge to Huntingdon. The nearest access north from Henham is at Duxford and the nearest access south from Henham is Bishops Stortford The M11 in our area goes for 3.6km and lies between Henham and Ugley.The M11 was built because ofthe large amount of traffic going to and from Stansted Airport which will increase now that Stansted Airport is to be developed.
